name: Puscifer
description: '''Puscifer''' ({{IPAc-en|ˈ|p|ʊ|s|ᵻ|f|ər}}) is an American [[Rock music|rock]] group formed in Los Angeles by [[Maynard James Keenan]], lead singer of [[Tool (band)|Tool]] and [[A Perfect Circle]]. Initially Keenan was the only permanent member and he considered the project to be his "creative subconscious". Later, frequent collaborators Mat Mitchell and [[Carina Round]] became permanent members.
